titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on a certain chemical used in the textile industry.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/18/1998--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2000, the duty on phosphonic acid, (1- hydroxyethylidene)bis-, tetrasodium salt (used in the textile industry).
